line: what are you guys doing up
oh we wanted to finish the crossword before we went to bed
hey do you know a six letter word for red
yeah i think that is wrong but there is a connect the dots in here for you later
aww you guys are so cute
all right see you in the morning
yknow i love doing crossword puzzles with you honey
now let us finish this and go to bed
there is only one left three letter word not dog but
uhh we still need a tip
how much more do we need
you guys should probably keep talking this could take a while
oh my god this is a police badge
why would a cop come in here though
yknow what actually could you discover the badge again
i think i can come up with something better than that
phoebe i bet somebodys missing that badge
yeah i should probably take it back
while at the police station i could check their ten most wanted lists because my friend fritzy has been like number 11 forever so this could be her year
sorry i borrowed it i was cold
well uh it is just that uh yknow if if you are gonna be wearing someones sweatshirt should not it be your boyfriends and i’m not him
sorry give it back to you
i mean it is gonna be all smelling like monica
are you saying i smell bad
no you smell like a meadow
the last time joey went to a meadow his mother was shot by a hunter
yeah i still do not know
sorry i just wanna make sure that i bought the right couch
i need a couch that says kids welcome here
but that also says come here to me
the come here to me is yknow for the ladies
ross honey it is a nice couch
it is not a magic couch
could you just sign right here please
the delivery charge is almost as much as the couch
come on he lives three blocks away
all right rach let us go
oh come on it is only three blocks
and and it is not very heavy try it
you two are really gonna enjoy that couch
oh yeah we are uh yeah we are not together
something did not quite add up there
what is that supposed to mean
well you her i mean she is very yknow
not that it is any of your business but we did go out
come on i do not really want to be doing this right now
i am carrying a very heavy couch
not only did we go out we did it 298 times
a loser you did it with 298 times
you cannot put your cigarette out on a tree
yeah i can it worked real well
do not ever do that again
until i have my next cigarette
yeah that is right you are so busted
unless you wanna spend the night in the slammer you apologize to the tree
i am not going to apologize to a tree
you apologize to the tree right now or i am calling for backup
ross did not you say that there was an elevator in here
uhh yes i did but there is not
there is no more left left
oh okay lift it straight up over your head
any chance you think the couch looks good there
so this guy was all and all buffay homicide
phoebe you were supposed to take that back
i know but having so much fun doing good deeds
okay but impersonating a police officer is a serious thing
you could get arrested right now
all right yeah i gotta take it back
yeah i didn’t know you guys were going to be here
what is going on with you
you have been acting strange all day
i kinda had a dream but i do not want to talk about it
whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa what what if martin luther king had said that
i don’t want to talk about it
you had a dream about a girl that i am seeing
i cannot tell you how many times dreamt about a girl that he was seeing
anyway we are talking about your dream
do not worry there was not any s x in it or anything
i have not dreamt about her like that since i found out about you two ish
you were my girlfriend and we were doing the crossword puzzle
yknow like you guys were doing last night
in love with monica and be moving out
that doesn’t mean that that you are in love with me
like uh all of the sudden you are jealous because become the apartment stud
that kinda sounds like your dream dude
or it could mean that that you saw chandler and me together and we yknow were being close and stuff and then you just want to have that with someone too
in the dream i did enjoy the closeness
joey look are you attracted to monica
right here right now are you attracted to her
but that is good that you are not in love with me because you just want a girlfriend
no i do not think it is just about just getting a girlfriend
i mean yeah i can get a girlfriend
yeah we could sit in the chair and do crosswords but yknow are we ever going to have yknow the closeness like like you guys have
well yknow monica and i were friends before we started dating
so maybe maybe that is it
hey umm do you guys have that tape measure
oh yeah it is actually in my bedroom
excuse me is this your car
well i do not think it is very nice of you to park here yknow you are blocking the entrance
well it is a problem for me which means it is a problem for you because a cop
oh okay so you are a cop which means you can park anywhere because i know that because a cop too
so all right keep up the good work
so wait what precinct are you with
oh i know a guy in homicide up there
yeah in fact undercover right now
who who else is in vice up there
umm do you know umm sipowicz
no i do not think so
no i do not know him
don’t try to call him or anything because he is not there he is out
his umm his partner just died
wow umm tell sipowicz real sorry for his loss
i i sure will take care
hey by the way sure sipowicz is gonna be all right
i heard that kid from silver spoons is really good
and where did you find my badge
joey would you mind giving me and ross a hand moving his couch
oh love too but i got acting class
i guess i can blow that off for you
uh hey rach let me ask you something
uh i was just over there talking to monica and chandler boy they are really tight
yeah that is not such a bad situation they got going over there
thinking of getting me one of those
well the reason i think monica and chandler are so great
is because they were friends first
so i asked myself who are my friends
you and phoebe and i saw you first
saying maybe you and i crank it up a notch
yknow honey umm as uh as flattered as i am that uh you saw me first uhh i just i i do not think we should be cranking anything up

yeah well yknow umm no honey listen i think it is a great idea to become friends with someone before you date them but i think the way you do it is yknow you meet someone become their friend build a foundation then you ask them out on a date
do not hit on your existing friends
will not will not that take longer
oh but once you find it ohh it is so worth the wait
man i wish i saw phoebe first
no no you come here to me
well i brought the next best thing
the next best thing would be monica
yknow i would be offended but monica is freakishly strong so
look i i drew a sketch about how we are gonna do it
whoa oh what is what is that
you certainly think a lot of yourself
that is that is my arm
i thought you just really really liked your new couch
okay i do not think we can turn anymore
ross i do not i just do not think it is going to fit
okay i do not think it is going to pivot anymore
all right let us uh let us bring it back down and and try again
okay yeah i think it is really stuck now
i cannot believe that did not work
i mean you had a sketch
oh yknow what did you mean when you said pivot
did you make any new friends
yeah yeah i met this woman
uhh well she is really good in bed
joey i thought you were gonna try to be friends first
well look hey it is all your fault
well because you did not give me advice
you gave me a pickup line
as soon as i told her i wanted to yknow build a foundation and be friends first
i suddenly through no fault of my own became irresistible to her
there was three of us for crying out loud
can you believe i found it on the second floor
oh my god phoebe are you gonna go to jail
well if going down taking you with me
that is one to three years minimum
but you will never make it stick and you know it
yeah but i kinda do not have a choice it is my job
as long as you understand that going to call my lawyer and once he puts you on the stand he will make you look like a fool
i do not like looking foolish
maybe uh i do not arrest you today
maybe i came by and you were not here
i would love it if i were not here
okay so since umm you are not going to jail tonight i was wondering if you would like to go to dinner with me
ever since you flashed my badge at me i kinda cannot stop thinking about you
you are the prettiest fake undercover whore ever seen
i did not see that coming
you are you are asking me out
i mean i coulda done it better but these people keep staring at me
umm yeah like to go out with you officer
okay so it is a date
so ooh i gotta ask you though
how did you know where to find me
well you are fingerprints were all over my badge so i just ran it through the computer and this was listed as your last known address so i just checked it out
i gotta tell you i looked at your record and you have done some pretty weird stuff
yeah we will talk at dinner
so come by in a couple hours and pick you up
and do not worry not just gonna take you out for donuts
did you cut this couch in half
this couch is cut in half
i would like to exchange it for one that is not cut in half
you are telling me this couch was delivered to you like this
look i am a reasonable man
give you store credit in the amount of four dollars
